title: Russian military says it evacuated 52 civilians from Syria's Ghouta
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - The Russian military said late on Sunday that it had managed to evacuate 52 civilians, including 26 children, from Syriaâ€™s rebel-held eastern Ghouta after talks with local authorities.
FILE PHOTO: A boy is seen in the besieged town of Douma, Eastern Ghouta, in Damascus, Syria March 8, 2018. REUTERS/Bassam Khabieh/File Photo The civilians, inhabitants of the town of Misraba, were taken to a temporary refugee camp where they were receiving medical aid, the Russian military said in a statement.
Reporting by Maria Kiselyova; Editing by Eric Meijer
